Everything's
New On The
TWA 747
—even the "goings-on"!
You are about to fly a passenger plane so
excitingly different there's even a special new
way to get on board. Believe it or not, your
first move is to pick a movie!
millsfield:images_texts:
Everything's
New On The
TWA 747
—even the "goings-on"!
You are about to fly a passenger plane so
excitingly different there's even a special new
way to get on board. Believe it or not, your
first move is to pick a movie!

gracious, spacious travel!
The TWA 747 is a totally new experience in
flying. The cabin has a living room look-thick
carpets, rich upholstery, warm colors. And
superb spaciousness-high ceilings, wide double
doors, two aisles throughout. There's extra
headroom and extra tootroom too-those
carry-on "essentials" go into overhead storage
oins that operate pneumaticaly. And there s
the extra drama of a winding stairway, with the
rirst Class penthouse lounde ат тпе тор.
very posh! very personal!
Your TWA 747 seat, wider and deeper than a
conventional airliner seat, has a built-in lumbar device
which shapes it to the curve of your spine. To operate,
push the confour button while sitting away trom the
seat back. Then lean back and press the button again.
The seat will deflate wherever there is pressure and
conform to your body. Incidentally, you'll enjoy
these other personalized teatures at your fingertips:
entertainment selector and tone control, head set
jack, reading lamp switch, hostess call button.
the new nonconformity!
Extensive service facilities on the TWA 747
make a special kind of individuality possible.
For example, during dining hours you can
choose your own time to dine. It you re hungry,
eat early. Or relax and have a drink. Then,
when you feel like eating, just let the hostess
know. Bar service is available throughout
the flight. And on international trips there's a
snack bar stocked with sandwich makings and
beverages-TWA's treat to in-between eaters.
tips and tidbits!
• If you're flying the 747 domestically, the
skycap at the TWA terminal will take your bags
when you arrive and check them through.
• When you fly the 747 internationally, your
baggage will be weighed in at the ticket
counter before being checked through.
• Besides having a number on it, your 747
baggage claim check is coded with a letter. To
pick up baggage at your destination, just
go to the counter with the same letter.
• If you're making a TWA connecting flight
at JFK,* there's no change of terminals.
Step onto your new flight without stepping
outside the building.
• At TWA exclusive Immigration and Customs
facilities speed up and smooth out
arrivals for travelers returning from
Europe through New York.
• You can call TWA no matter where you're
headed. TWA routes cover the U.S.A. coast to
coast, as well as Europe, Africa, the Middle
East and Asia. TWA even flies all the way
around the world.

your castle in the air!
Superbly spacious. Lavish in luxury. The TWA
747 is everything a passenger plane should
be-because it has everything our passengers
asked for. Our survey of over 300,000 air
travelers told us what was needed and what
was wanted even before we began. We asked
questions. And got the answers. You'll find
them when you step aboard the TWA 747.
TWA
